name: Memory Leak
description:
One day in crowded Hong Kong in the not-so-distant future, one young woman has a bad day.

Memory Leak is a story-centric platformer focusing around Rin, a young woman with anterograde amnesia who recently moved with her dog to Hong Kong.

Built for Ludum Dare 42: "Running out of Space".

Controls:

WASDMoveSpaceJumpNum 1, Num 2Make Selection

Playable in browser or via downloaded archive.  Please let me know if you have any issues with the web version.  Unity WebGL can be very browser-dependent.  The Windows version is a good fallback if you have any issues.
